title: Spain Rail Map - Train Routes in Spain
text:
Plan your train route through Spain with this handy Spanish rail map Spain Rail Map Showing Major Cities 
This map is intended to be used for travel planning and to get an idea of the extent of Spain's rail network. It shows the major Spanish cities and rail lines. The lines in purple show high-speed train routes. The brown lines are only suitable for slower trains. (Be aware that lines may be upgraded since this document was written.) Spain Rail Map - Train Routes in Spain Rail Map of Spain © James Martin, licensed to About Spain - Types of Trains 
In Spain the highest speed trains are called AVE - Alta Velocidad Español. The line that runs from Madrid to Sevilla takes 2.5 hours to complete. 
The Euromed is a high speed train that operates between Barcelona, Valencia and Alacante. 
A reservation is necessary to travel on any train other than Regional Exprés or Cercanías (suburban train). Official Rail Site 
For more detailed information on Spain's rail system, see the RENFE site. It's often slow, but you can get timetables and prices and find ticket offices and stations. Spain Rail Passes 
A variety of different Spain rail passes are available, including the two-country France'n Spain Pass and Spain 'n Portugal Rail Pass . The Spain FlexiPass offers any 3 days unlimited train travel in a 2 month period. 
You can book many tickets online, including the AVE trains: AVE Booking Center . 
Don't understand which of the many rail passes might be for you? See Rail Passes - Which Eurail Pass is Right for You? Transit information for Spain's Major Cities
